rooms.description: Spacious entrance with storage and seating area
Open-plan space integrated with kitchen and living area per Vastu guidelines
Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining the living room
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living area
Functional guest room with built-in storage and a small study area
Dedicated home office space with natural light and privacy, located near the entrance for easy access
Storage for appliances, cleaning supplies and other utilities
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy
Private bathing area adjoining the master bedroom
Additional bedroom with sufficient space for storage and relaxation
Dedicated entertainment room with acoustics designed per modern aesthetics

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
